name: Runtime 3310
description:
A small Puzzle Game made for the Nokia 3310 Jam 4.

Your Goal

You play as the little blob and you need to defuse the bomb.

Don't waste any time, the clock is ticking.

Complete all 14 levels.

Controls

Use SPACE to start the game and proceed to the next level.

Use the arrow keys, the numpad or WASD to move your player around.

Theme implementation

The Theme UPGRADE is very loosely implemented.
I wanted to experiment with dynamic difficulties. So each time you finish a level at the first attempt, the difficulty is increased for the next level. If you need more than 4 attempts to complete a level, the difficulty is reduced.

How was the difficulty curve for you? Let me know in the comments!
